Attacks.Name: Swift
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover. If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Attacks.Name: Moonblast
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, reduce the target character's attack dice by 1 on their next attack.

Attacks.Name: Draining Kiss
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, heal 1 damage from Sylveon for each damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Pixilate
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of the next Round, Normal-type attacks counts as a Fairy-type attack for effects and interactions.

Superpowers.Name: Charm
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. That character has -2 dice on all attacks during its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Mystical Fire
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character loses 2 power.
